english: Sanitation Standard for Bottled and Packaged Drinking Water
title: 包裝飲用水及盛裝飲用水微生物衛生標準

articles.content: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
This standard applies to bottled and packaged drinking water which is suitable for consumption.
The quality of the source water used in the production of packaged drinking water shall meet the requirement of「Quality Standard of Source Water for Drinking Water」.

Microbiological criteria (Only applied to bottled and packaged drinking water which is suitable for direct consumption):
┌────────────┬──────────┐
│Microorganism           │Limit               │
├────────────┼──────────┤
│Coliform bacteria       │Negative            │
├────────────┼──────────┤
│Fecal Streptococci      │Negative            │
├────────────┼──────────┤
│Pseudomonas aeruginosa  │Negative            │
└────────────┴──────────┘
This Standard shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
